name: epicurus
text: The dialogue in the last panel is worth a five, I think.

name: judahnielsen
text: I'm with you. Teodor's line is one of the best sentences I've ever read.

name: radishes
text: I agree too. Let us each revel in our own metaphorical pool house.

name: rainwolfj
text: I prefer a metaphysical manifestation of a pool house.

name: i_love_kate
text: A comment left by i_love_kate was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Rhadamanthus, cherojack, sevenarts, Ariamaki, Skodra, iidebaser, mattylite)

name: epicurus
text:
I half-agree. The other phrasings are clearer, but the one that was used has better comedic timing (it takes a moment to get what he is saying and that makes it better) and also it sounds more faux-intellectual which fits with the scene.

Oh god my comment was even more pedantic than yours I AM SO SORRY INTERNET I AM SO SORRY

name: kelsotimebomb
text:
I personally would have used "made in."

Please accept these two pennies. They are symbolic of my thoughts.

name: tommycrashwreck
text: Once on television as a child I saw a policeman say to Batman, "That's my two cents," and then I saw Batman reply, "...worth every penny," and now I can't remember if it was Batman: The Animated Series or Batman/Superman Adventures

name: atticusonline
text: Well hell that's not worth a lot at all.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Well, as one looking from the outside in through a glass darkly tinted, you're wrong.

name: cave_of_wonders
text: Um... the majority of the humor in Achewood for me is Onstad's intentional misuse of the English language. You basically said "I wish he would've made this less funny."

name: atticusonline
text: I reject you all based on your appearance.

name: djwhiterabbit
text: agreed.

name: flyinglemon
text: Seconded.

name: madnes
text:
The last panel always reminds me of the scene in Boogie Nights, where Amber and Rollergirl can't leave the bedroom.

"Too many things, too many things".

name: bozendoka
text: Agreed, for what appears to be no less than the 58th time.

name: johnnytruant
text: panels 3 and 4 are worth a five

name: dropkickpikachu
text: The first four panels are amazing. I love when Onstad does panels without dialogue.

name: whitey
text: I agree.  I had my finger on the 5 trigger after the first four panels.  The rest was just gravy.

name: kochipoik
text:
I had to re-'read' the first four panels, just because they were so awesome. Then I saved the picture, opened it in paint, stitched those four panels onto one line and set it as my desktop background.

Aint no explainin' those panels, other than great.

name: rainwolfj
text: I think I'm missing something if you've managed to read those panels...

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
i see what you did here.

and that is hilarious.

name: jamers
text: Panel 3 is awesome. Smiles in perfect equilibrium.

name: niraj
text: Agreed

name: nurdbot
text: Got to love that raised eyebrow of Teodors when he they wave at him.

name: lexsenthur
text:
After all the awkwardness of see his friends in what appears to be some bizarre sex ritual, he finally realizes "This is too damn weird, time to go inside and find out what these guys are actually doing.

Of course, his fears come rushing back when he is surrounded by his friends wearing cell phone strap-ons, calming himself by thinking, "It's okay, I don't think they'd have their way with me if I said 'no.'"

name: craigola
text: I couldn't help but notice that those contraptions never came up for sale on this site.

name: somanywhales
text: A comment left by somanywhales was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Contrasoma, Jesler729, mortshire, equinn2006, Afkpuz, Centipede_Damascus)

name: mangtastic
text: T�odor?  T�odor?

name: mangtastic
text:
What the hell .

How did you get the accent to work?

name: rowboat
text: Yes. Do tell. My inability to figure that out has secretly really bothered me over the past three years.

name: morganization
text: while the dialogue is genius, the first panel when they realize teodor is watching them is pretty fucking funny

name: overmedicated
text: Those two are so goddamn cute when they smile.

name: ich_bin_ilya
text: beef smiles so rarely. it's nice to see.

name: ggvaidya
text: No longer wondering where his real dong is must have cured his depression! And you're right, those are beautific smiles.

name: saru
text:
I do this only because I made the same mistake for so many many years, and in the anonymity of the Intertron you may learn in the glorious silence that does not require pride.
But I believe you mean beatific

name: eonblue174
text: You know, Roast Beef isn't just depressed, I think.  He just doesn't spread his joy evenly.  Has anyone been as happy as him when he saw the guys do Cheers?  Not even Philippe.

name: theseknives
text: A comment left by theseknives was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Connellingus, keithcozz, Boyd)

name: kazad
text: Congratulations, in a way.

name: jesler729
text: This, combined with Roast Beef eying him up and down, is pretty danged creepy out of context.

name: presterjohn
text: Usually I ain't big on using Achewood quotes in real life, epicurus-style, but really your life is not correct if you haven't tried greeting a friend with this line.

name: spinynorman
text: man I ain't fallin for that one again

name: centipede_damascus
text: A comment left by centipede_damascus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by envika, salo, Connellingus)

name: ctrl-s
text: PERFECT SENTENCE.

name: never_die
text: the enlightenment on Teodor's face in panel 11 is...is...beyond utterance.

name: jaydub
text: Does T stuff his shirt?  His profile with and without his shirt look distinctly different.

name: connellingus
text: The sweater Penny made for him must be pretty thick.

name: plezure
text: Ray stole my idea.

name: joeyramoney
text: teodor looks excellent without a shirt on.

name: estutius
text: Teodor sounds like me after three hits of LSD.

name: goatmasterflash
text: three hits of LSD, a shot of weed, and two tabs of tequila

name: mangtastic
text: I have frequently heard doses of LSD referred to as "hits".  No need to be a dick about it.

name: girdag
text:
'We've made a discovery. A breakthrough. Please, remove your pants.'

Oh, how that phrase could either herald happiness or hell.

name: c_dizzle
text:
I thought it sounded like a line out of a Monty Python skit.

Replace "pants" with "trousers."

name: gumfish
text: I always mess up when saying something about pants to someone online and then remember they're British.

name: spinynorman
text: We really need to steal that word. "Trousers" is just goddamn hilarious.

name: saint
text: an enlightened Teodor is not scared off by the proposition or remaining in the pool house for an indefinite amount of time...although, if they remain in the pool house, how can they expect to pull in more converts to the walk of the enlightened?

name: nbray
text: The desire to pull in more converts is a symptom of unenlightenment. The enlightened T�odor has no wants.

name: mastronaut
text: I wish I could chubby that statement more.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: Wouldn't it be enweightenment?

name: ariamaki
text: I am openly in love with the ending line here, and use it whenever possible to blow off arrangements.

name: zem
text: A comment left by zem was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by saru, cpnglxynchos, Slab64, kochipoik)

name: xi
text: But how else are we to broadcast our severe loserdom to the world? HOW WILL THEY KNOW?

name: charchar
text: WHY FIND OUT?

name: fosters
text:
You know the first few times I read this statement I interpreted it at "I am in love with the ending line like it's a living thing, and thus when people propose an arrangement like marriage I blow them off for my true love, the ending line." I like it better this way. It freaked me out.

Needless to say I am completely high as hell.

name: captainphaze
text: Teodor is just dragged into the greatness by Ray and Beef. Saying that, the last panel is a glorious illustration of why we should ALL wear these pants.

name: hardelicious
text: It takes a special couple of dudes to get spotted pouring water in each others' extended crotch cup and immediately default to pleasant, unassuming friendliness.

name: ampkit5
text: Wow, I really misread the title of this strip.  Thought it said Teodor is bi- curious.

name: deusoma
text: That was the joke, unless I miss my guess.

name: charchar
text: That title is quite possibly the best arrangement of words across which I have come today.  I am in Sci-Fi class, and "Sci-Fi Curious" is going on my binder.  In Sharpie, so they know I am serious.

name: fineoakstructure
text: charchar is Sci-Fi Serious

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Roast Beef: New zine

name: drago25
text: Viva el Revolution!

name: taiiga
text:
Counter Weighted Underpants = LSD

Seriously!

name: jar
text: Yes.

name: mrslickster
text: Is it just me, or is this like the first time you ever got sort of stoned?

name: hatcatrat
text: I love ham..

name: stereo
text: I hope I'm not the only one who started crying during this arc, because something so awesome will never happen to me.

name: killingthejay
text: these garments add a new dimension to the phrase "acid pants."

name: mintyhelminthes
text: Teodor's waist is 18 inches?  that's a deluxe sized teddy bear

name: nonanon
text: I cannot five this comic hard enough.

name: chestnimitz
text: The only bad thing about achewood is that it is impossible to describe a typical joke to your friends. Lord how I have tried.

name: harlotbug3
text: Big ditto there. I just caught up to the current storyline. Two months of, honestly, the greatest comic strip I've ever seen, but I feel like God just spoke to me in a language all his own.

name: ham_shoes
text: Teodor had to take a minute to decide whether or not to go out there.  "These guys, they are okay.   ... ...maybe"

name: dipstikk
text: Why there is not an animated gif of panels 1-7 yet is beyond me.

name: milo
text: maaan, I wish it really were as simple as strapping a tinfoil appendage to myself. altho to be fair I don't know if anyone's tried it yet :)

name: buttbutter
text: "If I had plans, they were made by an incorrect life I no longer maintain."

name: theguitarhero
text: Yup, that's the line.

name: jaminspoon
text: I like how he put quotes around it, because then you know he is quoting the comic and not discussing a matter.

name: litfanbreastman
text: Teodor has hella nipples.

name: chetyre
text: Oh boy!  The "You haven't seen these highest rated" sidebar has been taunting me for quite some time now since I'm reading in order.  Finally, one of those strips came up :P

name: powdeddonuter
text: [IMGS OFF]
